thoughts.text: We should clone a repository to work on a new project.
thoughts.reasoning: Cloning a repository will allow us to work on a new project without having to start from scratch. It will also help us learn from other people's code and practices.
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that the repository is relevant to our goals and that we are not infringing on any licenses or agreements. I also need to make sure that we are not introducing any security risks by cloning the repository.
thoughts.speak: We should clone a repository to work on a new project.
